name: DataTransferItemList.add
description: The DataTransferItemList.add() method creates a new DataTransferItem using the specified data and adds it to the drag data list. The item may be a File or a string of a given type. If the item is successfully added to the list, the newly-created DataTransferItem object is returned.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'add()' in HTML Living Standard.
